label: Safes and Cabinets
description: Products designed to secure valuable items, including safes and cabinets for guns, documents, and other items.
intents: Protect valuable items from theft or damage

subcategories.label: Fireproof Safes
subcategories.description: Safes designed to protect items from fire damage.

subcategories.label: Home Safes
subcategories.description: Safes designed for use in the home.

subcategories.label: Commercial Safes
subcategories.description: Safes designed for use in commercial settings.

subcategories.label: Wall Safes
subcategories.description: Safes designed to be mounted in walls.

subcategories.label: Floor Safes
subcategories.description: Safes designed to be installed in floors.

subcategories.label: Key Safes
subcategories.description: Safes designed specifically for storing keys.

subcategories.label: Other Safes
subcategories.description: Safes that don't fit into other subcategories.
